name: Regione Toscana - Ufficio di collegamento con le Istituzioni comunitarie a Bruxelles
goal:
As governmental regional body, depending directly from the Presidency the Brussels office of Tuscany Region pursues institutional and territorial interests.
Its main goals are:
Good management and implementation of European Structural and Innovation Funds;
Implementantion at regional level of European Regulations and Strategies;
Supporting Regional actors in participating to EU initiatives;
Participation to European projects;
Participation to the activities of the Committee of the Regions.
Participation to different EU networks
Contribution to EU policies given the regional experience based on specific interests linked to the ground
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
As expression of the Regional Gevernment, The Brussels office of Tuscany Region is following all existing policies which fall under its institutional and territorial competences.
A specific interest is devoted to:
Smart Specialization Platforms; European funding direct programmes (eg. H2020, LIFE+, etc.); European Structural and Investment Funds; State Aids regulations; All policies having an impact at territorial level; Post 2020 policies
